#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define MAX 10000

int main()
{
    int i, n, x, y, req, k;
    scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &x, &y);
    map<int, bool> map1;
    vector<int> vec;
    req = y-x;
    for(i=0; i<n; i++){
        scanf("%d", &k);
        if(k>10000)
            continue;
        if(map1[k])
            continue;
        if(k<=(req+1))
            vec.push_back(k-1);
        map1[k] = true;
    }
    bool dp[req+10];
    memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));
    dp[0]=1;
    for(i=0; i<vec.size(); i++){
        for(k=vec[i]; k<=req; k++){
            if(dp[k-vec[i]])
                dp[k] = true;
        }
    }
    if(dp[req])
        cout << "POSSIBLE\n";
    else
        cout << "IMPOSSIBLE\n";
    return 0;
}
